description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、研究馆员，现任故宫博物院副院长、中国史学会清宫史研究会秘书长，是享受国务院政府特殊津贴的专家。主要从事清代政治制度与礼俗研究。
description.en: Chinese historian and research fellow, currently serving as the Deputy Director of the Palace Museum and Secretary-General of the Qing Palace History Research Association of the Chinese Historical Association. She is an expert who receives the special government allowance from the State Council. Her research primarily focuses on the political system, rites, and customs of the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国黑龙江省的城市，是任万平的出生地。
description.en: A city in Heilongjiang Province, China, and the birthplace of Ren Wanping.
The dominant ethnic group in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国吉林省长春市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Changchun, Jilin, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京紫禁城内的博物馆，任万平于此工作并担任副院长。
description.en: A museum in the Forbidden City in Beijing, where Ren Wanping works and serves as deputy director.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性史学学术团体。
description.en: A national academic society for history in China.

en: History of Qing (People's Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国组织纂修的清朝历史著作。
description.en: A historical work on the Qing Dynasty compiled under the organization of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院为高级专业技术人员和高技能人员设立的津贴和荣誉。
description.en: An allowance and honor established by the State Council of the People's Republic of China for high-level professional and technical personnel and highly skilled personnel.

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台推出的一档文博探索类节目。
description.en: A cultural and museum exploration program produced by China Central Television.

description.zh-cn: 中国中央电视台文博探索类节目《国家宝藏》的第二季。
description.en: The second season of the CCTV cultural and museum exploration program 'National Treasure'.
Ren Wanping is of Han ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 1990年6月毕业于吉林大学历史专业，获硕士学位。
description.en: Graduated from Jilin University in June 1990 with a Master's degree in History.

description.zh-cn: 自1990年8月起在故宫博物院工作，历任宫廷部原状陈列组组长、宫廷部副主任、古器物部副主任、器物部主任，并于2015年12月起担任副院长。
description.en: Worked at the Palace Museum since August 1990, serving successively as head of the Original State Display Group of the Palace Department, Deputy Director of the Palace Department, Deputy Director of the Antiquities Department, Director of the Objects Department, and has been the Deputy Director since December 2015.

position.en: Secretary-General of the Qing Palace History Research Association

description.zh-cn: 曾任国家《清史》纂修工程特聘专家。
description.en: Formerly served as a specially appointed expert for the state's 'History of Qing' compilation project.

description.zh-cn: 任万平是享受国务院政府特殊津贴的专家。
description.en: Ren Wanping is an expert who receives the State Council Special Government Allowance.

description.zh-cn: 任万平代表故宫博物院参加了《国家宝藏》第一季的录制。
description.en: Ren Wanping participated in the recording of the first season of 'National Treasure' on behalf of the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 任万平代表故宫博物院参加了《国家宝藏》第二季的录制。
description.en: Ren Wanping participated in the recording of the second season of 'National Treasure' on behalf of the Palace Museum.
